title: All About Chocolate
subtle:

description: All About Chocolate is an informational book that is sure to make the reader's mouth water. Interesting facts about the history of chocolate, where and how cacao trees are grown, and the steps taken to make chocolate into candy are included. A "History of Chocolate" timeline and consumer consumption chart provide additional details. This book is one of three multilevel readers. Book and lesson also available at Levels R and U.
highFrequencyWords: cacao, consume, fermentation, ingredients, plantations, pods, pulp
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Vowel Digraphs : Identify vowel digraphs ee, ea, and ie
awareness: Subject and Predicate                : Identify simple and complete subjects and predicates
phonics: Content Vocabulary                : Understand and use content vocabulary
grammar:
